Token.Abstract: The protocol by which the delegate is kept notified of SFCamera's operations and scan results.
Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that 3D products for the image snapped have been found. The result is an NSDictionary representing some metadata and the matched 3D products in key-value pairs.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: results
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary representing the matched 3D products and some metadata. Guranteed to be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that an item description for the image snapped has been found.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: itemDescription
Parameter.Abstract: the NSDictionary representaton of the item description found. Can be empty in case no match has been found.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that a barcode was matched.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: barcode
Parameter.Abstract: recognized barcode object. Guranteed to be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that 2D products for the image from the current video frame have been found. The result is an NSDictionary representing a short info about the matched products and their contents in key-value pairs.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: imageInfo
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary represeting a short info about the matched 2D products. Can be nil in case no match has been found.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that additional info for the previously recognized 2D products has been found. The result is an NSArray representing the additional products info in key-value pairs.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: products
Parameter.Abstract: NSArray represeting the 2D products found. Cannot be nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate of the progress done in matching the image snapped by reporting the stage currently being processed.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: stage
Parameter.Abstract: enum representing the current recognition stage.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate of the progress done in matching the image snapped by reporting a numeric value and informative message.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: a percentage from the whole search process (from 0 to 1).

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: a short description of the current search stage.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that an error has occured while trying to fulfil some task of the 2D recognition engine (verification of credentials, sync with local storage, no response from the matching server, etc). This method is only called when using the Premium account.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView`.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: the encountered scanning error.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that the Slyce 3D search has finished.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that an image object from the current video frame is ready.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: image representing the video frame captured when SFCameraViewâ€™s snap method was invoked.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate the image matching process has started.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: the request fulfilling the image recognition.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: the image being searched. The image is the video frame captured when SFCameraView's snap method was invoked.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that the scanner was touched in a specific point.

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: point representing a touch location in the presenting view (the one that SFCameraView object was initialized with) coordinate system.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that 3D products for the image snapped have been found. The result is an NSDictionary representing some metadata and the matched 3D products in key-value pairs. (Deprecated: since 1.9. Use sfCameraView:didReceiveResults: instead.)

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: products
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary representing the matched 3D products and some metadata. Guranteed to be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that a barcode was matched. (Deprecated: since 1.9. Use sfCameraView:didDetectBarcode: instead.)

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: barcode
Parameter.Abstract: recognized barcode object. Guranteed to be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that 2D products for the image from the current video frame have been found. The result is base64 encoded string representation of the products along with an additional NSDictionary representing a short info about the matched products and their contents in key-value pairs. (Deprecated: since 1.9. Use sfCameraView:didDetectImage: instead.)

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: encodedString
Parameter.Abstract: string representing the recognized 2D products in base64 format. Can be nil in case no match has been found.

Parameter.Name: productInfo
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary represeting a short info about the matched 2D products. Can be nil in case no match has been found.

Token.Abstract: Informs the SFCameraViewDelegate that additional info for the previously recognized 2D products has been found. The result is an NSArray representing the additional products info in key-value pairs. (Deprecated: since 1.9. Use sfCameraView:didReceiveImageInfo: instead.)

Parameter.Name: cameraView
Parameter.Abstract: the current SFCameraView.

Parameter.Name: products
Parameter.Abstract: NSArray represeting the 2D products found. Cannot be nil.
